title: Malaysia Five-Star Cameron Highlands Retreat
description:
Take a break from Kuala Lumpur's city bustle and escape to rolling hills and picturesque tea plantations with a relaxing stay at Cameron Highlands Resort, a five-star retreat that effortlessly blends English elegance with Malaysia's breathtaking natural wonders. Fronted by an impressive 18-hole golf course and backed by a sweeping mountainscape laced with trails, this boutique hideaway invites you to discover the splendour and romance of the region's heritage in luxury style. Stay in gorgeous timber-beamed rooms and suites adorned with colonial charm, and relax in lavish communal rooms reminiscent of English aristocracy. 

Curl up with a good book in the Drawing Room, unwind with a tea treatment at the award-winning Spa Village or explore the surrounding strawberry farms and cascading waterfalls before swinging into a round of golf. Located a scenic three-hour drive from Kuala Lumpur, this hinterland sanctuary is perfect for long weekend escapes with a loved one or an extended family stay amid nature.
offer_address: Cameron Highlands, Pahang, 39000 Tanah Rata, Malaysia
